definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: The knowledge and comprehension derived from the empirical study on the Mathematics and science learning of indigenous student.
sentences.chinese: 原住民学生数理学习实征研究产出的知识与学习理解。

sentences.english: Why reforming Canada’s unpopular laws on indigenous rights is so hard
sentences.chinese: 为什么要改革加拿大原住民权益的陋法如此困难？

sentences.english: and some native peoples in Mongolia and northern Russia ride reindeer.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古和俄罗斯北部的一些原住民还骑驯鹿。

sentences.english: The coast is populated largely by Miskito Indians and descendants of African slaves.
sentences.chinese: 沿岸住满了大量的米斯基托原住民和黑奴的后代。

sentences.english: My wife is indigenous, that's a native original American.
sentences.chinese: 我的妻子是原住民，也就是美国本土人。

sentences.english: Highlights included going to the utterly fantastic U'mista Cultural Center, absolutely the finest museum of native Canadian (or American) artifacts I have ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 这绝对是我所参观过最好的北美洲原住民博物馆。

sentences.english: The second chapter talks about the process how the East India Company conquered the southern aborigines.
sentences.chinese: 第二章讲述荷兰东印度公司征服南部原住民的过程。

sentences.english: Shiretoko's original inhabitants, the Ainu, had referred to the peninsula as the end of the world.
sentences.chinese: 知床的原住民阿伊努人把这个半岛看作是世界的尽头。
美洲原住民女性的语音需要。

sentences.english: Taiwanese woman in an indigenous village opens up a recycling station.
sentences.chinese: 原住民村落的台湾妇人为环保站努力。

sentences.english: This area is mostly inhabited by aboriginals.
sentences.chinese: 这个区域大多数的居民是原住民。

sentences.english: The African natives are hunted for bushmeat.
sentences.chinese: 这些非洲“原住民”正因为它们的肉而被猎杀。

sentences.english: Native Americans have long used jojoba oil to heal sores and wounds.
sentences.chinese: 美洲原住民长期使用荷荷巴油来治疗伤口。

sentences.english: These sharks are named " Wobbegong", an indigenous Australian word that means "bearded".
sentences.chinese: 这些鲨鱼名为斑纹须，是澳洲原住民语胡须的意思。

sentences.english: Wolves are indigenous to many parts of Azeroth.
sentences.chinese: 狼是艾泽拉斯许多地方的原住民。

sentences.english: The native people of New Zealand are called the Maori.
sentences.chinese: 新西兰的原住民被称为毛利人。

definition: to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
Maori, indigenous Polynesian people of New Zealand
(lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
